data.message: hi how r u today  well my crohns is causing me alot of pain i am on pain meds on and of i have been on pain meds  since a teenager ive never been addicted to them when i need them i need them when i dont i dont take them my cat scan showed that my crohns is not doing well so smoking weed did not help at all so im not smoking any more i cant wright my books and poems when i smoke and i want to wright not get high so pray for me to get these books done i have the grandchildren today its not easy when your sick but they give me a reason to keep on going my crhons  can kill me but im not going to let it i have alot to live for how r u im sure you dont read your comments i just need to talk now sometimes i dont want to and im silent i havnt talked that much im still praying for you and your family   ill talk to u latter have a wonderful day kid
